original_text: The people of Judah say, ‘We know how proud Moab's people are. We have heard how they boast about themselves. They think that they can do anything that they want. But all their pride is empty and useless!’
korean_text: 우리가 모압의 교만을 들었나니 심히 교만하도다 그가 거만하며 교만하며 분노함도 들었거니와 그의 자랑이 헛되도다

sentences.original_text: We know how proud Moab's people are
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모압 백성들이 얼마나 교만한지 알고 있다

sentences.original_text: We have heard how they boast about themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들이 스스로를 자랑하는 것을 들었다

sentences.original_text: They think that they can do anything that they want
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 원하는 것은 무엇이든 할 수 있다고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: But all their pride is empty and useless
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들의 모든 교만은 헛되고 쓸모없다
